#summary Information about updating the PMTK3 documentation

Documentation for PMTK3 is generated by the following scripts. See [http://code.google.com/p/pmtk3/source/browse/#svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools  /misc/metatools/docTools] for supporting files.

|| [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/publishDemos.m publishDemos] || _details_ ||
|| [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/generateAuthorReport.m generateAuthorReport] || _This script takes 30 seconds to run, and generates [contributingAuthors these tables]._ ||
||[http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/generatePmtkStats.m generatePmtkStats] || _This script takes about 30 seconds to run, and generates [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/pmtkStats.html this table]._ ||
||[http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/docTools/generateSynopses.m generateSynopses] || _This script takes about 10 seconds to run, and generates [synopsisPages these tables]. It also updates the wiki page, and thus requires a checked out copy of [http://code.google.com/p/pmtk3/source/browse/#svn/wiki wiki branch] of the svn repository. Check the top of the file to make sure the path information is correct._ ||
||[http://pmtkdata.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/generatePmtkDataTable.m generatePmtkDataTable] || _details_ ||
||[http://pmtk3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/metatools/debugDemos.m debugDemos] || _details ||
